display_long_description:
Cat Project is a high-energy Gorilla Tag fan game that brings new life to the VR tagging experience. Designed for both casual players and competitive enthusiasts, it builds upon the core mechanics of Gorilla Tag—running, jumping, climbing—with smooth locomotion and immersive physics, all without buttons or sticks. Dive into a world where gorilla movement feels more alive than ever before.

Set in a range of dynamic, player-crafted maps, Cat Project offers a constantly evolving playground for chaotic fun. Every surface is grabbable, every corner is a potential ambush point, and every match is unique. Whether you’re swinging across lava-filled canyons, scrambling up snowy mountains, or darting through neon-lit cities, the thrill of the chase never gets old.

Unique to Cat Project is the revival mechanic: tagged players don’t sit out—they can be revived by teammates, encouraging teamwork and turning every match into a strategic battle of skill and timing. The game includes ranked lobbies, daily challenges, custom cosmetics, and seasonal events, with frequent updates and community involvement driving its growth.

Built in Unity with support for mods and user-generated content, Cat Project is more than just a fan game—it’s a platform for creative players to expand the Gorilla Tag universe. Whether you're playing for laughs, grinding for cosmetics, or testing your skills against the best, Cat Project offers an exciting, community-driven VR experience that revives the spirit of tag.
